body_html:
@FacultyHMS If I remember right you just need to reshape it from HxWx1 to 1xHxW
you can just initialize a new array with

a = np.array(1,H,W)
a[1] = org[1,:,:]
//org is your original image

or this should be vice-versa . I forgot if it was from PIL to normal or from normal to PIL.
Hope it helps
body_text:
@FacultyHMS  If I remember right you just need to reshape it from HxWx1 to 1xHxW
you can just initialize a new array with
a = np.array(1,H,W)
a[1] = org[1,:,:]

or this should be vice-versa . I forgot if it was from PIL to normal or from normal to PIL.
Hope it helps
body:
@FacultyHMS  If I remember right you just need to reshape it from HxWx1 to 1xHxW
you can just initialize a new array with 

```
a = np.array(1,H,W)
a[1] = org[1,:,:]
//org is your original image
```

or this should be vice-versa . I forgot if it was from PIL to normal or from normal to PIL.
Hope it helps
